list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: compress or squeeze forcefully so as to break, damage, or distort in shape.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the front of his car was crushed in the collision
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mặt trước của chiếc xe của anh ta bị nghiền nát trong vụ va chạm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a government or state) violently subdue (opposition or a rebellion).
bring about a feeling of overwhelming disappointment or embarrassment in (someone).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his defeat crushed a lot of supporters
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thất bại của anh ấy đã nghiền nát rất nhiều người ủng hộ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a crowd of people pressed closely together, especially in an enclosed space.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a number of youngsters fainted in the crush
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một số thanh niên ngất xỉu trong lòng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a brief but intense infatuation for someone, especially someone unattainable or inappropriate.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she did have a crush on Dr. Russell
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy đã phải lòng Tiến sĩ Russell

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a drink made from the juice of pressed fruit.
